translation:
Piratini, October 18, 1838.

Most Illustrious Sir

The government orders that Your Lordship São João, citizen Manuel da Silva Pacheco, if the goods seized on the sloop “Mineira” exist at Mendonça Pass or in the warehouses of D. Antônia, at Barra de Camaquã, so that the carts sent from here with the purpose of transporting such goods can go directly to the place where the cargo is received; and this may be done immediately by Your Lordship Francisco Antônio Machado, who leaves here today with carts for the transport of the aforementioned goods.

God preserve Your Lordship  
Domingos José de Almeida
